pkgmetadata.longdescription: # GrammarGraphCreating graphs from context-free grammars for fun and profit.## Features* Creating sub graphs* Export back to grammars* Reachability* Filter abstraction* Dijkstra's algorithm for shortest paths between nodes* Checking whether a (sub) graph represents a tree* Computing k-paths (paths of exactly length k) in grammars and derivation trees, and a k-path coverage measure ([see this paper](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8952419)) of derivation trees based on that.Have a look at our [feature demo](DEMO/DEMO.md)!## InstallGrammarGraph requires at least Python 3.9.We recommend to install GrammarGraph in a virtual environment. Example usage (inside project directory):```shellpython3 -m venv venvsource venv/bin/activatepip install -r requirements.txt# Run testspython3 -m pytest -n 16```Author: [Dominic Steinh√∂fel](https://www.dominic-steinhoefel.de).
